comments.body:
Lyrics:  
Y'all gully smokers, hiding like stress won't phase ya?

Y’all embarrassed of 'em, that’s not right, that ain't how mama raised us.

Take that mask off, I wanna see what's under them achievements

Why believe you? Ain't seen nothin' special from your campus

'Cause you lied about your clubs, you lied about their sponsorships

You lied about Placements, faked it to secure your place.

You hide about Shubham, you hide about management

They all pussy, he paid 'em off just to save face.

You lied about campus life, you lied about your AT, huh

You lied about Aditya Prabhu, 60Cr could keep it low

You lied about campus when you ain’t got the size to show

Fuck main campus, you gonna rot in PES
Diss track season at PES before GTA 6 is crazy
Fuck Kendrick vs Drake  , this is beef we've all been waiting for🗣🗣🗣🔥🔥🔥
WE MAKING IT OUT THE QUADRANGLE WITH THIS ONE!!!
We got PES campus dissing each other before gta 6
lets gooo ec goated fr fr
Thank god i passed out before having to see all this
What a day to be alive in EC Campus!!!🗣️🗣️🔥🔥
